trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Puyallup
There was one other sighting in Puyallup on or around September 22nd 2009
divs: sighting detailsthere was a huge, brilliant bright ufo hovering 500 feet with a probe sticking out to the left of the craft and a dark image below it. it was visible for 2+ hours and moved a total of 1,000 feet west during 2 hours. we watched with our binoculars and night vision goggles. we also saw 4 ufo's (east, west, southwest). they were all identical, pulsating red, green, red, green. they remained stationary, not moved, except the one south of us that went up\down and side to side. when i looked through normal binoculars, i could see a black spacecraft with 6 lights tilted sideways next to the brilliant bright one. it must have been 1\2 mile long. it would have been camouflaged, but i saw the dense of the black ship as it was solid black and the lights were positioned as a massive ufo. called the national mufon and told her if a local person came, they could witness something fantastic. the local person didn't call back. this is the 3rd time in less than a week, but growing in quantity seen and intensity.
Summary: 5 UFO's over Fort Lewis Military Base (3 were green/red flashing and one bright, large ones)
